properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens

properties.name: jwt.access-token-expires-in
properties.description: Expiration time (in seconds) for JWT access tokens

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token-expires-in
properties.description: Expiration time (in seconds) for JWT refresh tokens

properties.name: security.public-paths
properties.description: Comma-separated list of public API paths that do not require authentication

properties.name: file.upload-dir
properties.description: Directory path where uploaded files are stored

properties.name: file.max-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed size (in bytes) for uploaded files

properties.name: file.allowed-types
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed MIME types for uploaded files

properties.name: file.allowed-extensions
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions for uploaded files

properties.name: file.max-application-attachments
properties.description: Maximum number of attachments allowed per application
